text: Guan Jianhua (born 1962) is a female Chinese former international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won three World Championship medals. She won a bronze medal at the 1985 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's doubles with Tong Ling and two more bronze medals at the 1987 World Table Tennis Championships in the mixed doubles with Wang Hao and the women's singles. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Chinese female table tennis players Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:People from Yangquan Category:Table tennis players from Shanxi Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Guan Jianhua
